籤詩版本二:
Go straight to Immortal Rock to learn from Immortals
Once this knowledge is announced by the emperor,
The sun and moon always shine in the blue sky
The reputation of a righteous heart spreads all over the world
詩意: This hexagram is a symbol of receiving guidance from noble people. Everything goes well together.
解曰: There is a beginning and an end. Don't go west or east. Use your heart. There are many noble people.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Zhiyuan defected to the army
Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) was from Shatao (Shatuo tribe).
Liu Zhiyuan and his wife Li Sanniang lived in his uncle's house. His uncle suspected that Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) was poor, so he coaxed Zhiyuan to go to the melon garden, hoping that Liu would be eaten by the two melon spirits. Zhiyuan took a gun at night, fought the melon spirits, went underground, and dug up the ground. Get the sword and the book of war.
He picked up his sword and military skills, said goodbye to his wife, and joined the army. He took refuge with Yue Xun and served as an official to appeasement envoy.
The Khitan destroyed the Jin Dynasty, leaving the Central Plains without a master. Zhiyuan became emperor in Jinyang.
The country was changed to the Later Han Dynasty. It is still called Tianfu (year name) without changing the era.
聖意:
The house is safe.
itself auspicious.
Seeking wealth is beneficial.
The transaction is satisfactory.
Marriage Double match.
Rokko Male.
Pedestrian: Return.
Field silkworms are half harvested.


Six animals win.
Looking for people and meeting.
The lawsuit was won.
Migration is lucky.
Lost property South.
Disease: An.
Mountain tomb is auspicious.
古人: Liu Zhiyuan defected to the army
